channel.title: Some1 plz answer these questions!
channel.description: ok i have 3 questions, i kno to change ur player rights you need to go to characters, i don't know where the characters menu is where is it? some1 said u can only change ur rights if u own a server is this true? also, how do u make urslef max stats and how do u get items like full dragon (instantly) could some1 plzz answeer[br][size=1]Posted on: June 27, 2007, 02:27:29 PM[/size][hr]also wtf when i look up the item ID's (like "dragon longsword") all it says is "no topics matched your search" wtf is up with that?

item.title: Some1 plz answer these questions!
item.dc:creator: @jensie jensie
item.description:
@jensie wrote:

Um, you can make people mod if you want to, mods don’t own the server, they just being jerks to new people

Read full topic

item.title: Some1 plz answer these questions!
item.dc:creator: @speedhighway speedhighway
item.description:
@speedhighway wrote:

i looked up item id in “items” in the help menu[br][size=1]Posted on: June 27, 2007, 03:09:20 PM[/size][hr]also, if u own a server, u can b a mod in any other server rite? cause i’ve seen like 5 mods in 1 server and they don’t all obviously own the server

Read full topic

item.title: Some1 plz answer these questions!
item.dc:creator: @jensie jensie
item.description:
@jensie wrote:

Hi, you can only edit your stats etc if you OWN a server.
So if you don’t have one, I don’t need to answer the first question.
To max you stats you should use ::master, or, ::maxall (mostly used) but then again, this can (probably) only be used by admins… (when you have a server you’r the admin yourself )

And where do you look up the item ID?

Read full topic
